entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
